name: Super Catboy's Halloween Dash
description: Help Catboy collect sweets and dodge creeps! Use the space bar to jump around and collect as many sweets as possible. This game was made in a single night so there may be some V-sync issues; however, it's still really fun to play and insanely addicitve. You can get hold of the game on itch.io, so be sure to check it out. New features may be coming soon...
